meanings.definition: Cautious or careful in behavior or speech.
meanings.sent1: She was very guarded when talking to strangers.
meanings.sent2: The guarded approach helped him avoid making mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed guarded around the new dog in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her guarded response hinted at hidden feelings.
meanings.sent5: The guarded expression on his face revealed his uncertainty.

meanings.definition: Protected or kept safe from harm.
meanings.sent1: The guarded fortress stood strong against enemy attacks.
meanings.sent2: The guarded treasure was hidden deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The guarded cookie jar tempted the mischievous child.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a guarded sanctuary, shielded from pain.
meanings.sent5: The guarded walls of the castle kept the princess safe.

meanings.sent1: The guarded prisoner was under constant surveillance.
meanings.sent2: The guarded students followed the teacher's instructions.
meanings.sent3: The guarded garden gnome seemed to move when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His every move was under the guarded eye of the security camera.
meanings.sent5: The guarded painting was protected by laser sensors.
